entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add missing Async methods to System.Threading.Channels on .NET Standard 2.0 #96039

Updated

  • System.Tests.StringTests failing on windows-arm64 Release NativeAOT_Libraries leg #96279
  • PInvokeTests.IEnumeratorTests.TestManagedToNative crash #96154
  • [mono][tests] Multiple library tests report icall_wrapper_mono_generic_class_init failure #96050
  • XUnitLogChecker: `runtime-libraries-coreclr outerloop` tests are unable to find the tool DLL #96035
  • [wasm] HybridGlobalization: V8 crash on `System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema.Tests` #95981
  • Failing test - `System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.ThreadPoolMinMaxThreadsEventTest` on Linux/arm64 #95873
  • [wasm] `Assertion: should not be reached at D:/a/_work/1/s/src/mono/mono/sgen/sgen-scan-object.h:93` in `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests` #95805
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_Create_Invalid #94498
    9.0.0
  • Failing test `tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.cmd` on mono/osx #95669
  • [wasi] `System.Globalization.Tests` AOT build fails with `LLVM ERROR: out of memory` on Windows #95365
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Test timing out - `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToWasmPageWithoutAssetsComeBackAndHitAgain` #95343
  • System.Net.HttpListener.Tests failure: Expected _associatedHttp11ConnectionCount=0 > _availableHttp11Connections.Count=0 #95220
    9.0.0
  • [7.0] jit-dasm failed with error MSB3971 #95161
  • [8.0] [wasm] [AOT] HTTP Error 500.30 - ASP.NET Core app failed to start #95160
  • [6.0] An attempt was made to transition a task to a final state when it had already completed. #95158
  • [6.0] GSSAPI operation failed - Unspecified GSS failure - Crypto routine failure - Unexpected EOF trying to read request header #95156
    9.0.0
  • [6.0] Error 12175 calling WINHTTP_CALLBACK_STATUS_REQUEST_ERROR, 'A security error occurred' #95155
    9.0.0
  • `System.Memory.Tests` - segfault on coreclr Ubuntu/x64 #95103
  • [8.0] [OSX] Long Running Test: System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.ReadEncryptedRsa16384 #95094
    Future
  • [8.0][wasm] Failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorPrimitivesTests.RunForEachSpecialValue #94891
    8.0.x
  • [8.0] Failing to build native components #94823
    8.0.x
  • Test failure - System.NullReferenceException in System.Threading.Lock.TryInitializeStatics #94728
    9.0.0
  • Task wasn't RunSynchronously with TaskScheduler specified #94653
  • System numerics abort at System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator.Multiply #94610
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_DeleteCategory #94395
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Failure in Wasi.Build.Tests.WasiTemplateTests.ConsoleBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #94537
    8.0.x
  • An error occurred trying to start process 'llvm-symbolizer' #91975
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] perf: AOT `CompileError: WebAssembly.Module(): Compiling function #116384:"System_Linq_Expressions_System_Linq_Expressions..." failed: not enough arguments on the stack for call (need 4, got 2) ` #94431
  • Failing test `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.CancelStopAsync` #94268
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] `Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.SimpleRunTests.BlazorBuildRunTest` failing on Windows #94240
  • [browser][hybridGlobalization] WBT: Hybrid Globalization fails with AOT #94212
  • [wasm] Runtime tests' build gets terminated with `exited with code 137` #94077
    9.0.0
  • Test failure in DecryptEnvelopedOctetStringWithExtraData (linux x64) #94067
    9.0.0
  • `System.Linq.Queryable.Tests` native crash for `mono_interpreter` `Debian.11.Amd64` #93990
    9.0.0
  • French abbreviated month names not showing up as expected #90639
    9.0.0
  • Failing test - `HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async_HttpMessageInvoker.RequestDuration_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded` #93627
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #58628
    9.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Http11_Cancellation_Test.ConnectionFailure_AfterInitialRequestCancelled_SecondRequestSucceedsOnNewConnection fails #93413
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Test failure: System.ComponentModel.Tests.DefaultValueAttributeTests.Ctor_TypeDescriptorNotFound_ExceptionFallback - Exit code was -1073740791 but it should have been 42 #93372
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes - System.ObjectDisposedException #93347
    9.0.0
  • JIT\Stress\ABI\pinvokes_d tests timed out #93297
    9.0.0
  • Segmentation fault in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #93206
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] System.Runtime.Caching assert fails on linux-bionic #93106
  • The system cannot open the device or file specified 'NuGet-Migrations' #91987
    Future
  • illink - Task host node exited prematurely #92951
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TestCheckChildProcessUserAndGroupIds failing Subset assertion #92944
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: Blazor tests on windows failing with `Failed to bind to address` for random ports #92910
  • [8.0] File used by another process in Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.SimpleRunTests.BlazorBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #92805
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] 'RanToCompletion' failure in System.Threading.RateLimiting.Test.ConcurrencyLimiterTests.DoesNotDeadlockCleaningUpCanceledRequestedLease_Post #92804
    8.0.x
  • `System.Net.NameResolution.Functional.Tests` - crashed with `Process terminated. Assertion failed.` #92793
    9.0.0
  • Test infra failure on iOS.Device.Aot.Test.WorkItemExecution CI leg #92792
    9.0.0
  • tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh Timed Out on Mono OSX x64 with interpreter #92733
    9.0.0
  • System.Management.Tests fail with System.Management.ManagementException #92518
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadWrite_Random_Success #86565
    9.0.0
  • [mono] System.IO.IsolatedStorage test failures on MacCatalyst #92481
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tvos] OOM in System.IO.Tests.MemoryStreamTests #92467
    9.0.0
  • [6.0, 7.0, 8.0] Connection reset assert failure in System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_SyncForceNonBlocking.TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose #92423
    8.0.x
  • [8.0] coreclr test failure: readytorun_GenericCycleDetection._Depth3Test_Depth3Test_._Depth3Test_Depth3Test_sh() #92420
    8.0.x
  • [8.0] [mono] Assert failed in ConsolePal.GetBufferInfo #92417
    9.0.0
  • MSBuild crashing in the build #92290
    9.0.0
  • AzDo uploading failure: "Blob is incomplete" #92148
  • Compiler crashes when failing to release Mutex #53420
    9.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests crashes on net9.0-linux-Debug-x64-Mono_release-Ubuntu.2204.Amd64.Open #92070
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Android x64: No pending exception expected: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException #92000
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Long Running Test: System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskPropertiesTests.TaskIDTest #91907
    9.0.0
  • Linux Mono DsaNotDirectlySupported Rfc3279DerSequence failed to sign #91898
    9.0.0
  • Address race in PerformanceCounterLib #90803
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Timeout waiting for CheckInspectLocalsAtBreakpointSite #91773
  • CI error: System.Net.Quic.QuicException: The connection timed out from inactivity #91757
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: !"UnwindManagedExceptionPass1: PAL_VirtualUnwind failed" #91723
    9.0.0
  • Networking certificate test failures #91705
  • Failure in System.Threading.RateLimiting.Test.ConcurrencyLimiterTests.DoesNotDeadlockCleaningUpCanceledRequestedLease_Post #91653
    9.0.0
  • AF: m_alignpad == 0 (LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests) #91569
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] [Long Running Test] System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CESchedulerPairTests.TestCompletionTask #91434
    9.0.0
  • STATUS_UNSUCCESSFUL in RsaCryptRoundtrip_OaepSHA1 #29683
    9.0.0
  • WinHttpHandler assertion failure #90613
    Future
  • tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource failing in CI #90605
    Future
  • System.Runtime.Numerics.Tests.WorkItemExecution failure terminate the process because of out of memory #90439
    9.0.0
  • Build Failure on MacOS ARM64 Rid issue with sqlite #90434
    9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking engine is pathologically slow on patterns like "((((((((a)*)*)*)*)*)*)*" and input like "aaaaaaa" which other engines handle fine #84188
    9.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException due to use of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BinaryOperatorKind.Error enum #90331
    9.0.0
  • Tracking issue for "WORKLOAD TIMED OUT" #90309
  • [browser] Fragile WebSocket CI tests #90257
    9.0.0
  • Crash in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn4.0.Tests.WorkItemExecution #90019
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Text.Json.Tests` crashing inexplicably #89984
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.DebuggerTests.MiscTests.TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` failing #89909
    8.0.x
  • [Test Failure] Long Running Test: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_Sync.SendRecv_Stream_TCP_LargeMultiBufferSends #89440
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Debugger tests getting randomly aborted on CI #89409
    9.0.0
  • [6.0] [mono] [linux] Conole test failure SetOut.SetOutReadToEnd #89084
    6.0.x
  • LibraryImportGenerator unit test segfault illegal memory access #89054
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationClientServer.CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok on Windows AoT #88832
    9.0.0
  • [7.0] [wasm] Chrome DateTimeTests CheckDateTimeLocale failure #88799
    Future
  • [7.0] Linux_bionic arm64 failure in Convert.cs causing FormatException in System.Diagnostics.Process tests #88756
    7.0.x
  • CI test failures in GenerateRuntimeGraphTests on tvOS simulator and iOS simulator. #77889
    9.0.0
  • [7.0] Globalization IcuAppLocalTests .TestIcuAppLocal test failure #88742
    7.0.x
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.ByteMixingOrNativeAVE_MinimalFailingTest #85331
    9.0.0
  • OOM on System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteRawLargeJsonToStreamWithoutFlushing #88272
    Future
  • [wasm] perf pipeline clang crashes on PERFTIGER200 #88148
  • [browser][MT] The WebSocket is not connected. #88084
    9.0.0
  • `JIT/jit64/opt/rngchk/RngchkStress2.cs` failing to build with `error CS8078: An expression is too long or complex to compile` #87879
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update MicrosoftNETCoreCoreDisToolsVersion to 1.3.0 #96291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Override DbConnection.DbProviderFactory for ODBC/OleDB #96290
    area-System.Data.Odbc
  • CI Test #96289
    needs-area-label
  • Testing #96279 #96288
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Enhance OSX's ProcessManager to extract process names from their paths #96287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Update coredistools #96286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • New exception handling diagnostic fixes #96065
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix JSON crashinfo exception object address #96284
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HybridGlobalization] Fix xamarin_macios build after system ICU change #96270
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
